## Project Overview

Channeling a curious love of the FNAF(Five Nights at Freddy’s) franchise, I converted cardboard, broken furniture, and old Halloween decorations into a walk-through trick-or-treat experience. I also fabricated three costumes with foam, fabric, and custom 3D modeled elements. My next iteration of this fright will add an interactive queue and expand the build into a full haunted maze.

## Skills Developed

-   Set & Prop Fabrication
-   3D Printing
-   Foam Sculpting
-   Lighting & Projection Design
-   Experiential Storytelling
